profile.name: Kasun Hapangama
profile.title: Software Engineer | Java, Spring Boot & C# .NET

summary: Java Backend Developer with 2 years of experience building secure APIs and web applications using Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and MyBatis. Currently pursuing a degree in Software Engineering at SLIIT. Certified as an Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 8 Programmer.

tasks: Developed secure and scalable APIs for the CTN Project, improving data protection and reliability.
Built core functionalities for the Osaka Gas Project, supporting key business operations.
Improved system performance and automated test cases to streamline development and QA.
Developed secure APIs for merchant registration as part of the CTN project.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver efficient solutions.
Enabled system access for 1000+ merchants, enhancing integration and availability.
Developed custom server-side addons for Minecraft at Summit Realms to meet client needs.
Created a server-side event management system for Spigot servers.
Collaborated with team members to ensure seamless integration of plugins.
Enhanced user experience by optimizing plugin performance and functionality.
Developed open-source software products, server-side video game addons, and web applications.
Sold 100+ copies, garnering over $1200+ in revenue and 5000+ downloads on various online forums.

projects.name: SunLicense | Software License Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive license management system built using Java Spring Boot and Vaadin.
details: Offers secure license validation, automated role assignment, and RESTful API integration.
Features an intuitive web dashboard, temporary licenses, and IP/HWID restrictions.
Achieved $1000+ in revenue and 50+ active customers within 2.5 months of launch.

projects.name: SunGuard | Code Obfuscator
projects.description: A web-based tool that wraps popular Java obfuscators to protect applications.
details: Features obfuscation, anti-debugging, and runtime checks for Java and Lua.
Gained early traction with 30+ customers and positive community feedback.

projects.name: CTN Project
projects.description: Mainstream bulk vehicle assessment service in Japan.
details: Developed APIs for the Merchant Portal, enabling secure data access for customers.
Successfully registered over 1,000 new merchants in the system.
Enhanced database performance by designing and optimizing queries with JPA and MyBatis.

projects.name: SlackL (FOSS)
projects.description: An open-source, self-hosted Slack bot integrating DeepL translations.
details: Directly addressed a company need for seamless multilingual communication.
Enabled real-time translation, enhancing cross-language team collaboration.

projects.name: Discord Leaderboards Premium
projects.description: A Minecraft addon to seamlessly integrate game leaderboards with Discord.
details: Designed and developed a high-performance, server-side Java addon.
Supports distributed Minecraft servers with over 100,000 concurrent players.

projects.name: Library Management System
details: Developed a full-stack library management application as part of academic coursework.

education.degree: BSc (Hons) in Information Technology - Specialized In Software Engineering
education.institution: Sri Lanka Institute Of Information Technology
details: Achieved Dean’s List recognition for outstanding academic performance.
Active member of SLIIT FOSS Community, contributing to events promoting open-source software.

Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2023 Certified Foundations Associate
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2023 AI Foundations Associate
Dean’s List Honoree (Y1S2 & Y2S2)
